cast.overview: After a violent storm, a dense cloud of mist envelops a small Maine town, trapping David Drayton and his five-year-old son in a local grocery store with other local residents. They soon discover that the mist conceals deadly horrors that threaten their lives, and worse, their sanity.
cast.title: The Mist

details.biography: Jackson Hurst was born on February 17, 1979 in Houston, Texas, USA as Jackson Ryan Hurst. He is an actor and producer, known for The Mist (2007), Cleaner (2007) and A Bird of the Air (2011). He has been married to Stacy Stas Hurst since June 6, 2014. They have two children.
details.name: Jackson Hurst
